actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Labor to study the feasibility of and need for a Cost of Existence Index.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Labor to study the feasibility of and need for a Cost of Existence Index. States that such index shall be an index of prices paid by retired persons, and shall be computed in a manner similar to the Consumer Price Index.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Labor to study the feasibility of and need for a Cost of Existence Index.
